cui_name: Stage I Pleural Malignant Mesothelioma AJCC v7
reasoning: Stage I pleural mesothelioma represents ~20% of diagnosed cases at stage I. Global mesothelioma incidence ~4 per 100k, with ~20% at stage I = ~0.8 per 100k. Asbestos exposure legacy.
source: GLOBOCAN 2005 (IARC); Mesothelioma data from National Cancer Institute
